Series_Title: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
Overview: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.
In WWI Africa, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.
On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

Series_Title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
Overview: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.
A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.
A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home to Kansas and help her friends as well.

In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story of five mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality blurs as the tale advances.

Series_Title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
Overview: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.
A national manhunt is ordered for a rebellious kid and his foster uncle who go missing in the wild New Zealand bush.
A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

A film crew goes to a tropical island for an exotic location shoot and discovers a colossal ape who takes a shine to their female blonde star. He is then captured and brought back to New York City for public exhibition.

Series_Title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
Overview: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.
The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.
Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.
Zak runs away from his care home to make his dream of becoming a wrestler come true.
A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.
The dramatization of a motorcycle road trip Che Guevara went on in his youth that showed him his life's calling.
